full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 SENIOR Yusuf M. Zhumkhawala 1747 Blossom Hill Road San Jose, CA 95124-6347 Phone: (408) 269-4508 S. 3 ALT NOTARY 674603-422236 Ph:- Pakistan 731694 DEPARTMENT AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT KARACHI I, Yusuf Moiz Zhumkhawala, a citizen of the United States of America, residing at 1747 Blossom Hill Road, San Jose, County of Santa Clara, California 95124-6347, United States of America, hereby solemnly declare are follows: Whereas Mr. Nooruddin Moosaji Tapal, father of my wife, Farida Yusuf Zhumkhawala, desires to travel to the United States at our invitation, I hereby undertake to provide for the support of Mr. Nooruddin Moosaji Tapal while he is in the United States. I further undertake to provide for all necessary cost of passage and travel expenses of Mr. Nooruddin Moosaji Tapal. I respectfully request the Consul General of the United States in Pakistan to grant Mr. Nooruddin M. Tapal's application for a visa to travel to the United States. Executed California. on this 26thay June of 1991 in San Jose, County of Santa Clara, Original seen & Comparee Yusuf Moiz Zhumkhawala PHOTOSTAT CERTIFIED COPY State of California SS County of Santa Clara On June 24 ,1991, before me, the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said State, personally appeared ***Y usuf Moiz Zhumkhawala* personally known to me (or Proved to me on the basis of satisfactory* evidence), to be the person whose name is subscribed to the within instrument and acknowledged that he executed the same. Witness my hand and official seal. OFFICIAL SEAL ROSA L EZRRE h2 Notary Public-California SANTA CLARA COUNTY My Comm. Expires Nov.. 13, 1994 PHBLIC NOTARY Attested senior N PAKISTAN our of All Notary public CHOCOLATE S. NASIR ALI Karachi Sentor Advocate Notary Public Karachi. ph 731604 and Under N.I: Act: 831
